name: 葛瑞斐
objective: Conversation in Western culture is built on stories.  Everybody knows the stories even though the stories are very old, or rather everybody knows them because they are very old.  This course introduces students to central thematic and cultural ideas in major works that are the foundation English literature and western thought.  They also provide essential background knowledge for any graduate study of western culture in general.
